## Total citations as of September 2024


::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-5}

<br>


- [Google Scholar](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=gMbkadsAAAAJ): 1174 (h-index = 12) 
- [Scopus](https://www.scopus.com/authid/detail.uri?authorId=57200209201): 799 (h-index = 11) 
- [Web of Science](https://www.webofscience.com/wos/author/record/ABE-7673-2020): 730 (h-index = 10) 
- [Research Gate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Konstantinos-Bougioukas): 981 (h-index = 12) 

:::
  
::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-7}

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| fig-align: left
#| out-width: 4.2in
#| out-height: 3.2in

library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
dat <- readxl::read_excel(here::here("data", "citations.xlsx"))


plot_ly(dat,
  x = ~year,
  y = ~citations) |> 
  add_bars(
  color = I("#7652F8"),
  #marker = list(color = "#7652F8"),
hovertemplate = ~paste('<b>Citations</b>: %{y} <extra></extra>'),
                        #'<br><b>Year</b>: %{x} <extra></extra>'),
width = 0.4
) |> 
  config(modeBarButtonsToRemove = c('select', 'hoverClosestCartesian', 
                                    'hoverCompareCartesian',
                                    'lasso2d', 'toImage'),
         displaylogo = FALSE) |> 
  layout(margin = list(b = 90), hovermode = 'x',
         xaxis = list(fixedrange = TRUE), yaxis = list(fixedrange = TRUE),
    annotations = list(x = 1, y = -0.36, text = "Source: Google Scholar Citations.", 
      showarrow = F, xref='paper', yref='paper', 
      xanchor='right', yanchor='auto', xshift=0, yshift=0,
      font=list(size=10, color="gray30"))
 )

```


:::
  
:::
